title: Vidaadha Lyrics Ko 2 Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Ko 2 Vidaadha Song Lyrics
Lyrics:Na. Muthukumar
Singer:Vishal Dadlani

Va va va
va va va va vettaiyaada
Po po po
po po po po nottampoda
Thaga thag thak
Thaga thag thak thak thaagathoda
Thiru thithikithu
thiru thiru thicku thirupaathoda

Yettaadha uyaramenna
Ulagathil engeyum
onnumilla
Ezhundhu vaa
Thappu nu therinjukitta
Thunichalaa
Sattunu nee adi daa

Pathoda panthinonna
Nee illai
Gethaaga kelambidu daa
Purapadu
machi nee kaiya vaachu
Polandhidu
Adi adi marana adi

Veriyodu nee ponaal
Un kaalgal vaanam erume
Veriyodu nee ponaal
Un vegam innum kodume
Kuriyodu nee ponaal
Un thooram thooram pogumey
Kuriyodu nee ponaal
Un thedal kaiyyil serume

Vidathey vidathey vidathey
Yetti pudi daa
Vidathey vidathey vidathey
Thottu pudi daa

Ethir kaaththu po pudidaa
Ethir neechal neeyum adidaa
Adir vettu nee vedi daa
Kanavellaam palikum

Ethir kaaththu po pudidaa
Ethir neechal neeyum adidaa
Adir vettu nee vedi daa
Nenachadhellam nadakum

Varalaaru engum
Dharmam vendradhadaa
Geethai kooda
Adhai dhaan sonnadhadaa

Veriyodu nee ponaal
Un kaalgal vaanam erume
Veriyodu nee ponaal
Un vegam innum kodume
Kuriyodu nee ponaal
Un thooram thooram pogumey
Kuriyodu nee ponaal
Un thedal kaiyyil serume

Vidathey vidathey vidathey
Yetti pudi daa
Vidathey vidathey vidathey
Thottu pudi daa

Va va va
va va va va vettaiyaada
Po po po
po po po po nottampoda
Thaga thag thak
Thaga thag thak thaka thaagathoda
Thiru thithi thiru thiru thiru
thiru thiru thi thi thirupaathoda

Yettaadha uyaramenna
Ulagathil engeyum
onnumilla
Ezhundhu vaa
Thappu nu therinjukitta
Thunichalaa
Sattunu nee adi daa

Pathoda panthinonna
Nee illai
Gethaaga kelambidu daa

machi nee kaiya vaachu
Polandhidu
Adi adi marana adi

Veriyodu nee ponaal
Un vegam innum kodume
Kuriyodu nee ponaal

Kuriyodu nee ponaal
Un thedal kaiyyil serume

seo.title: Vidaadha Lyrics Ko 2 Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Vidaadha Lyrics Ko 2 Song Lyrics from Ko 2. Read the lyrics penned by Na. Muthukumar and composed by Leon James and sung by Vishal Dadlani. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
